item.title: Tree overgrown and dangerous, 26th August
item.description:
The tree outside 120 is seriously overgrown and a danger to pedestrians as the branches are weak and wilting down. A few large branches have snapped off recently and fallen on the pavement. It is also causing damage to vehicles on the drive and the sap is causing serious damage to paintwork of cars on the drives.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marlborough Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unable to access gas meter, 26th August
item.description:
I have spoken to the maintenance team on numerous occasions and was reassured that my address would be down for regular weed/grass cutting but everytime the guys come to cut the grass they forget behind my property. The gate that is there was not erected by me. So they are allowed to open it to clear the weeds/shrubs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Estate Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Offensive flyposting in a shop opposite a barbers which is a diverse shop, 26th August
item.description:
A business has engaged in flyposting in their shop which is part of operation raise your colours which is a racist campaign to imitimidate migrants in the area This is not acceptable by anyone and it needs removing Please get the business to remove it from their window in cotmandene crescent

item.title: Fly tipping, 26th August
item.description:
Hello, our waste service first mile has no collected the waste outside of our offie and residents have added to random black sacks of waste outside which is not ours. I have reported our waste to first mile for collection but they will not take the rest

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fanshaw Street, Hackney, London
